channel.title: Can't start / join a match
channel.description:
What happened: Can't start Solo match, can't join with invite code. It's just saying "starting" / "verifying" and nothing happens. If code is already expired then this info is displayed immediately. Everything was fine a few days ago but today client downloaded and installed update. Doesn't look like firewall problem because i can see online counters (and don't have firewall).
Tryed to reinstall the game - didn't help.

item.title: Can't start / join a match
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Iceblink:

Can’t start Solo match, can’t join with invite code. It’s just saying “starting” / “verifying” and nothing happens. If code is already expired then this info is displayed immediately.

Thanks! I wonder if it was a certain combo to get there. I’ll check it out

Read full topic

What happened:
Can’t start Solo match, can’t join with invite code. It’s just saying “starting” / “verifying” and nothing happens. If code is already expired then this info is displayed immediately. Everything was fine a few days ago but today client downloaded and installed update.
